title: R package to query PhenoScanner
text: R package query PhenoScanner database human genotype-phenotype associations.

title: R package to query PhenoScanner
text: phenoscanner: function allows users query PhenoScanner database.

title: R package to query PhenoScanner
code: # Library library(phenoscanner)  # SNP res <- phenoscanner(snpquery = "rs10840293") head(res$results) res$snps  # Gene res <- phenoscanner(genequery = "SWAP70") head(res$results) res$genes  # Region   res <- phenoscanner(regionquery = "chr11:9685624-9774538") head(res$results) res$regions  # To query multiple SNPs, genes or regions, please supply a vector of SNPs, genes or regions to snpquery, genequery or regionquery options: res <- phenoscanner(snpquery = c("rs10840293", "rs10")) head(res$results) res$snp

title: R package to query PhenoScanner
text: Staley JR, et al. PhenoScanner: database human genotype-phenotype associations. Bioinformatics 2016;32(20):3207-3209. Kamat MA, et al. PhenoScanner V2: expanded tool searching human genotype-phenotype associations. Bioinformatics 2019;35(22):4851-4853.

title: R package to query PhenoScanner
text: Please abide terms use PhenoScanner using R package.

title: phenoscanner — phenoscanner
text: phenoscanner queries PhenoScanner database genotype-phenotype associations inside R.

title: phenoscanner — phenoscanner
code: phenoscanner(   snpquery = NULL,   genequery = NULL,   regionquery = NULL,   catalogue = "GWAS",   pvalue = 1e-05,   proxies = "None",   r2 = 0.8,   build = 37 )

title: phenoscanner — phenoscanner
text: snpquery vector SNPs. genequery vector gene names. regionquery vector genomic regions. catalogue catalogue searched (options: None, GWAS, eQTL, pQTl, mQTL, methQTL). pvalue p-value threshold. proxies proxies database searched (options: None, AFR, AMR, EAS, EUR, SAS). r2 r2 threshold. build genome build (options: 37, 38).

title: phenoscanner — phenoscanner
text: list containing data.frame association results data.frame SNP/Region/Gene information PhenoScanner.

title: phenoscanner — phenoscanner
